name: Pick Me Up - Be the president!
name_original: Pick Me Up - Be the president!
description:
A new concept game, Pick Me Up!
An oddly gratifying, weirdly entertaining game of becoming a president!
Lead the world figureheads and the funny heroes to presidency!

Huh, Trumpit? Ohama? Doctor McCoy? Captain Moon? Wow, even Irunman and Hul-Q!
Help the curiously familiar sounding world leaders and funny heroes become president.

Meet with the citizens and make them your supporters by giving them high-fives!
All you have to do is persuade the voters to be your supporters. The game is as easy as that!
